name: Automate Intelligent Document Data Extraction from Google Drive into Google Sheets Using Mindee V2
description:
Streamline your document processing by connecting MindeeV2 to Google Drive and Google Sheets.
This template automatically extracts structured data from documents such as invoices, receipts, ID cards, forms, and more, then logs the key fields into a dedicated spreadsheet in real time.
It is ideal for reducing manual data entry, improving accuracy, and keeping your financial or operational records consistently up to date.
